title: So Camille's ultimate is a free kill on the adc?
body:
http://www.kidsmathgamesonline.com/images/pictures/shapes/hexagon.jpg

It's a target zone that knocks away your tanks, makes Camille do additional damage, and stops you from leaving completely for 4 seconds. In a team fight the entire team can focus the adc easily. What is the thing that balances it out?
